verbose_text: The parameters n j represent the rate constants of transcription and stomata opening, m j are the rate constants of degradation; p j are constants of translation, protein modification and protein complex formation; g j are Michaelis-Menten constants and a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h, i, j are Hill coefficients; q j are the rate constants of acute (P dependent) light activation of transcription.
